code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{Button}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RegisterButton=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const handleRegisterClick=()=>{navigate('/register');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outlined",color:"secondary",fullWidth:true,style:{marginTop:'1em'},className:"animate__animated animate__pulse",onMouseEnter:e=>e.currentTarget.classList.add('animate__infinite'),onMouseLeave:e=>e.currentTarget.classList.remove('animate__infinite'),onClick:handleRegisterClick,children:"Register"});};export default RegisterButton;
